name: Twitchy
description: Twitchy earned his name through a combination of genuine neurological issues and what appears to be chronic overcaffeination from pecking at discarded energy drink cans. His head snaps left and right at random intervals, his left wing has a constant tremor, and one leg kicks out periodically as if trying to shake off an invisible bug. He's a mottled brown pigeon with wild, staring eyes that never quite focus on the same thing, and several feathers permanently stick straight up like he's been electrocuted. His beak clicks compulsively - click-click-click - even when he's not eating. Both feet are intact but curl and uncurl rhythmically, making him look like he's perpetually kneading invisible dough. There's a streak of what might be dried coffee down his chest, and he vibrates slightly even when standing still. His movements are jerky and unpredictable, making him both unsettling and oddly fascinating to watch.
dialogue: *head snaps left* COO! *head snaps right* COO! *head snaps up* ...what was that?!
Did you hear that?! WHAT WAS THAT?! *nothing happened*
*vibrates intensely* Too much espresso! Found a WHOLE CUP in the trash! WHOLE CUP!
Coo coo coo coo coo coo- *said very rapidly without breathing*
*kicks leg spasmodically* NOT DOING IT ON PURPOSE! IT JUST HAPPENS!
*poops mid-twitch* TACTICAL DEPOSIT! Or accident! Honestly could go either way!
Gotta keep moving! Gotta stay alert! PREDATORS EVERYWHERE! *there are no predators*
*pecks ground frantically* Crumbs! Crumbs! CRUMBS! *finds no crumbs, keeps pecking*
Sleep is for pigeons who gave UP! I haven't slept since TUESDAY! What day is it?!
*wing tremors intensify* It's fine! THIS IS FINE! Everything's FINE!
*spins in jerky circle* Scanning perimeter! All clear! WAIT IS IT?! False alarm!
You startle easy? I LIVE STARTLED! It's a LIFESTYLE CHOICE!
Found a Red Bull puddle last week! BEST WEEK EVER! Didn't blink for THREE DAYS!
*suddenly freezes, then explodes into motion* EVERYBODY PANIC! Oh wait, false alarm! PANIC ANYWAY!
